vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to desire, be inclined, be willing, be pleased
1a) (P'al)
1a1) to desire
1a2) to be pleased
1a3) to will (without hindrance) (of God)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 想望, 意欲, 心喜
1a) (P'al)
1a1) 想望
1a2) (神毫無攔阻的) 心喜, 意圖
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 想望, 意欲, 心喜
1a) (P'al)
1a1) 想望
1a2) (神毫无拦阻的) 心喜, 意图
